title: GeForce Now adds Discord integration and sign-in with latest update
content:
Nvidia’s GeForce Now has been steadily improving its integration with other gaming platforms and services, and the latest update delivers a useful new addition. Starting with the latest GeForce Now app updates, Discord integration has arrived.

more…

The post GeForce Now adds Discord integration and sign-in with latest update appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: With its latest update, Nvidia GeForce Now has added support for showing your game status in Discord, as well as signing in with the chat app
